title: Bike Goggles
description: I created an interactive map using mapbox and d3 that allows users to visulaize bike lanes and traffic at various times of the day in Boston and Cambridge, MA.

title: Mindful Metrics
description: Built an interactive data visualization tool that allows users to compares changes in heart rate across various meditation techniques against normal and athlete baseline readings.

title: Deceptive Visualizations
description: I created a pair of visualizations, one arguing for and the other agaisnt the proposition that black complainants are disproportionately involved in repeat incidents with the same police officers using NYPD police complaints data.

title: Grocery Pricing Analysis
description: Compared pricing and nutritional content of food products across major retailers like Whole Foods, Walmart, and Target.

title: Power Outage Predictions
description: Explored the relationship between the different classifications of regions and outage duration, and developed a machine learning model to develop a prediction system.

title: UCSD Enrollment Prediction
description: Predicted open seats in UCSD courses using enrollment data, capacity, fill rate, and class standing with machine learning techniques.

title: MTS Network Analysis
description: Analyzed bus arrival times using Poisson processes, including the Waiting Time Paradox, and visualized real-world transit data.

title: N-Gram Language Model
description: Built a text generation model using N-Gram probabilities, improving sentence coherence and reducing perplexity.

title: Multiproduction Trade Credit Research
description: Explored firm networks and trade credit flows in multi-production settings for an economics research project.
